html:
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}

Housing Clearance Certificate

Application Number: {{doc.name}}
Application Date: {{doc.application_date}}
Name Of The Applicant: {%- if doc.tenant_name is not none -%} {{doc.tenant_name}} {%- else -%} {{doc.application_name}} {%- endif -%}
CID: {{doc.cid}}
Application Status: {{doc.application_status}}
Application Approval Date: {{doc.application_approval_date }}
{%- if doc.application_status == "Approved" -%}
{%- else -%}
Remarks: {{doc.remarks}}
{%- endif -%}
name: Housing Clearance Certificate
